title: ID needed
content:
After a computer crash I lost my memo's and my donwloaded fonts.

Who can tell me the name of the TAART font.  
MONSTER I found yet (Poor Richard).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064231im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LOGO150_4167.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064231im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LOGO300_4419.png)

Font: 

 Shit Happens 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064231/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: Jelle85

comments.content:
Monster is [Poor Richard](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064231/https:/philsfonts.com/index.php/fonts/overview/PF00002401).

Edit: I should read more closely next time. Still, you might not be aware that there are two versions of Poor Richard and the one I linked to is the match.
